name: Project Norma
description:
This is a short 3D puzzle game. You play as a detective who must resolve a murder in Zollywood studio.

Each hint  helps to find who his the true murderer.

It's a game where you must find a word with hints and when you think it's the correct answer you can write this with the keyword.

For the moment, it's only a prototype, I must work the scenario and put the hint design.

My inspirations are "Professor Layton" and "Phoenix Wright".
